body_html:

does give an output

linux-vdso64.so.1 => (0x00003fff78ca0000)
libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00003fff77ea0000)
libpthread.so.0 => /lib64/libpthread.so.0 (0x00003fff77e60000)
libgfortran.so.4 => /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/./libgfortran.so.4 (0x00003fff77d40000)
libgomp.so.1 => /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/./libgomp.so.1 (0x00003fff77cf0000)
libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00003fff77b00000)
/lib64/ld64.so.2 (0x00000000969b0000)
libgcc_s.so.1 => /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/./libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00003fff77ac0000)
libdl.so.2 => /lib64/libdl.so.2 (0x00003fff77a90000)

body:
@avmgithub ldd /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/libopenblas.so.0
does give an output

linux-vdso64.so.1 =>  (0x00003fff78ca0000)
	libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00003fff77ea0000)
	libpthread.so.0 => /lib64/libpthread.so.0 (0x00003fff77e60000)
	libgfortran.so.4 => /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/./libgfortran.so.4 (0x00003fff77d40000)
	libgomp.so.1 => /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/./libgomp.so.1 (0x00003fff77cf0000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00003fff77b00000)
	/lib64/ld64.so.2 (0x00000000969b0000)
	libgcc_s.so.1 => /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/./libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00003fff77ac0000)
	libdl.so.2 => /lib64/libdl.so.2 (0x00003fff77a90000)
